Container.Name: ShelfBridge
Container.Overview: Sync your audiobook reading progress from Audiobookshelf to Hardcover automatically.
Container.Requires: Audiobookshelf server with API access and Hardcover account with API token

Config.Name: Audiobookshelf URL
Config.Description: URL of your Audiobookshelf server (include https://)

Config.Name: Audiobookshelf Token
Config.Description: API token from your Audiobookshelf server

Container.ReadMe:
## Setup
**Required:** 1. **User ID** - Any username/identifier you choose 2. **Audiobookshelf URL** - Your server URL (include https://) 3. **Audiobookshelf Token** - Get from Settings → Users → [Your User] → API Tokens 4. **Hardcover Token** - Get from https://hardcover.app/account/api
**Usage:** Container automatically syncs progress daily at 3 AM UTC.
**Advanced Configuration:** For custom schedules, multi-user setups, or library filtering, see the [Configuration Reference](https://github.com/rohit-purandare/ShelfBridge/wiki/admin/Configuration-Reference).
**Support:** [Troubleshooting Guide](https://github.com/rohit-purandare/ShelfBridge/wiki/troubleshooting/Troubleshooting-Guide) | [Discussions](https://github.com/rohit-purandare/ShelfBridge/discussions)
